name: RestaurantSounds
0:
”Alexa open Restaurant Sounds”
”Alexa ask Restaurant Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the bustling ambiance of your favorite dining spots with Restaurant Sounds, your personal gateway to the world's culinary hotspots through sound. Whether you're missing the clinking of glasses in a cozy bistro, or the sizzling sounds of a gourmet kitchen, Restaurant Sounds brings these vibrant soundscapes right into your home.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Restaurant Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
